import React from "react"; import "./booking.css"; import { Form, FormGroup, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Button } from "reactstrap"; const Booking = ({ tour }) => { const { price, reviews, avgRating } = tour; const handlechange = e =>{} return ( <>

${price} /per person

{avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} ({reviews?.length})
Information
); }; export default Booking;
